title: TPACK-Based Instructional Design for Teacher Competency Enhancement in Blended and Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and experience in language education
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning facilitated via an LMS in a limited technological environment centered around smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three core components of the TPACK framework (technology, pedagogy, content knowledge) to language education contexts.
Learners can propose at least two designs for digital-based activities that promote effective interaction in blended learning environments.
Develop three or more language teaching strategies (voice/text-based) that are executable in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
